1301207112425648131 2020-09-03 01:15:25 +0800 <epiplexis_> @Philgebunts @cymrurouge I'm only a layman here, but on the technicalities I think MMT is sort of post-Keynes, so you're not wrong to say it has a lot of stuff is familiar, but it reworks it in a different way ("print" rather than "borrow" in my layman's understanding).
